summary: Dynamic leader, with outstanding experience in major gifts, fundraising, event management, donor relations, government and community relations, public relations and marketing, board management and development, and strategic planning.

experience.title: Director of Donor Relations
experience.company: Montclair State University Office of Advancement
experience.description: Lead a $1.2 million fundraising budget and a three-person direct report team; designed and coordinated an institution-wide donor relations and stewardship program; managed key fundraising events; achieved 100% of Annual Golf Outing goal and 133% of Annual Scholarship Dinner goal; implemented donor acknowledgement policies and integrated donor relations programs.

experience.title: Director of Development
experience.description: Managed $1.2 million budget for department; oversaw annual fund, capital campaign, scholarship, marketing initiatives and stewardship programs; modernized external branding; managed staff of 2; redesigned annual fund program; achieved 100%+ of capital campaign goals; established Alumnae giving and Reunion Giving; managed portfolio of 250+ major gift prospects; achieved 100%+ FY15 goals.

experience.title: Donor Relations Manager
experience.company: Saint Peter's University Office of Advancement
experience.description: Responsible for $250,000 fundraising budget; oversaw donor stewardship, scholarship endowment, and portfolio of 100+ prospects; led Board of Regents engagement; implemented customized relationship management for leadership-level donors; managed donor scholarships and pledge processes; supported regional fundraising efforts.

experience.title: Annual Fund and Special Events Manager
experience.company: Englewood Hospital and Medical Center Foundation
experience.description: Oversaw $2.5 million Annual Fund; increased corporate and community sponsorships by 45%; managed major gifts portfolio; expanded Breast Cancer Walk; established Business Partner and Physician Partners programs; managed donor programs and events; negotiated advertising program; recognized with awards.

experience.title: Special Events & Annual Fund Manager
experience.description: Managed annual events in North Jersey; achieved fundraising goals for Golf Classic, Gala, and Making Strides; helped transform and grow Walking events and sponsorships.

experience.title: Director of Special Events
experience.description: Directed all annual events in the North Jersey Region; achieved goals within budget; expanded Walking events and increased sponsorships; recruited board members to revitalize committees.

experience.title: Director of Fund Development
experience.description: Responsible for a $1.5 million fundraising budget; modernized external brand and digital presence; closed $500K budget gap through board initiatives; achieved goals on signature events; established long-term fund development plan; expanded donor and campaign initiatives.

experience.title: Senior Marketing Communications Manager
experience.description: Developed and managed client portfolios; increased sales portfolio by 75%; awarded Customer Service Award in 2008 and 2009; managed branding and marketing initiatives for Sony's consumer and professional markets.

experience.title: Digital Media Specialist, Senior Marketing Communications Specialist, Senior Market Analyst
experience.description: Implemented online product launches for B2B and B2C; managed production and tradeshow coordination; received award for NAB first CDR; managed internal sales awards program; maintained confidential information and updated programs' websites.
